mapper.sql: PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZHWZHWDM, ZHW_ZZHWQSQKDM, ZHW_TXYSFSMS, ZHW_TXZL, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME
mapper.select: select p.*,d1.name zwwz,d2.name zwqsqk from leden_collect_palm p left join sys_dict_list d1 on p.zhwzhwdm = d1.code and d1.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWWZ' left join sys_dict_list d2 on p.zhw_zzhwqsqkdm = d2.code and d2.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWQSH' where RYJCXXCJBH = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_COLLECT_PALM (PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZHWZHWDM, ZHW_ZZHWQSQKDM, ZHW_TXYSFSMS, ZHW_TXZL, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME, ZHW_TXSJ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhwzhwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhwZzhwqsqkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhwTxysfsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhwTxzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhwTxsj,jdbcType=BLOB})

mapper.update:
update LEDEN_COLLECT_PALM
RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHWZHWDM = #{zhwzhwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHW_ZZHWQSQKDM = #{zhwZzhwqsqkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHW_TXYSFSMS = #{zhwTxysfsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHW_TXZL = #{zhwTxzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZHW_TXSJ = #{zhwTxsj,jdbcType=BLOB},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_COLLECT_PALM set RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHWZHWDM = #{zhwzhwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHW_ZZHWQSQKDM = #{zhwZzhwqsqkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHW_TXYSFSMS = #{zhwTxysfsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHW_TXZL = #{zhwTxzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZHW_TXSJ = #{zhwTxsj,jdbcType=BLOB} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
